summary: Adds The Elder scrolls Obivion And Skyrim Theme Songs In Metal For The Title Screen. This My First Mod! Be NICE!
descriptionHtml:
Adds The Elder scrolls Obivion And Skyrim Theme Songs In Metal For The Title Screen, they are respectful of the Originals and in my opinion (Loving Metal) Do GREAT Justice. Also He Respected The Original Work And Played Along Side The Original Recorded Track. Even If Your Not Into This Type Of Music I Encourage You To Try It Out, If You Don\'t Like It Simply Delete The \" mus_maintheme.xwm\" In
\"Skyrim/Data/Music/Special\"

This Cover Is By Victor De Andres I Take No Part In The Creation, All Respect And Acknowledgement
Goes To Him. I Just Love His Work. 

Visit His Site @:

http://www.victordeandres.com/site_eng/index.html
author: Victor De Andres  For Music Persona3 For Mod
